# <code>count-null</code> for dataframe

<div class='command-title'>Counts null values</div>

## Signature

```> count-null```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Counts null values
```shell
  > let s = ([1 1 0 0 3 3 4] | into df);
    ($s / $s) | count-null
```
